body:
Howdy this is an AMA for everyone. This is how it works. Anyone who posts on this thread is entered to the AMA (just make sure you make your post a reply to them). So basically it goes.

Zac: HI GUIZ!!!

Peachy:@Zac ur a nerd rite?

Zac:@Peachy PROVE IT, NO BALLS

Michael:@Peachy ur fat rite?

Peachy:@Michael YEA

Steven:@Michael unban meme?

Michael:@Steven No ur not dank enuf to be unbanned you meme.

title: AMA {EveryOne}

replies.body: Please do not make spam posts. There is no need for a global AMA, as they are intended to be personal.
replies.body_tagged: Please do not make spam posts. There is no need for a global AMA, as they are intended to be personal.
